Atra Basics

Atra is a templating language that compiles to static HTML. The syntax is similar to HTML, but with additional features.

Basic Syntax

atra 
                                
                                    // Basic HTML element
div(){
  text("Content");
}

// Element with attributes
div(class="container" id="main"){
  h1(){
    text("Title");
  }
}

Text

Use the text() function to add text content:

atra 
                                
                                    p(){
  text("This is a paragraph");
}

Components

Components allow you to create reusable elements with parameters.

Defining a Component

atra 
                                
                                    // In .atrac file
$button(text, color){
  button(class="btn btn-{color}"){
    text("{text}");
  }
}

Using a Component

atra 
                                
                                    // In .atra file
$button("Click me", "primary");
$button("Cancel", "secondary");

Styling

Atra supports inline CSS styles using @[] blocks:

atra 
                                
                                    @[
  .container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 1rem;
  }
  
  .btn {
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
]

Special Functions

Atra offers special functions for flow control and data manipulation:

%if - Conditions

atra 
                                
                                    %if("true"){
  p(){
    text("This text will be displayed");
  }
}

%each - Iteration

atra 
                                
                                    %each("apple", "banana", "orange"){
  li(){
    text("{item}");
  }
}

%repeat - Repetition

atra 
                                
                                    %repeat("Hello World!", "3");

%readFile - Reading Files

atra 
                                
                                    %readFile("content.txt"){
  p(){
    text("{content}");
  }
}

Project Structure

Example Atra project structure:

text 
                                
                                    my-project/
├── config.json
├── src/
│   ├── index.atra
│   ├── about.atra
│   └── components/
│       ├── header.atrac
│       ├── footer.atrac
│       └── card.atrac
└── dist/
    ├── index.html
    └── about.html

Configuration File

json 
                                
                                    {
  "source_folder": "src",
  "output_folder": "dist"
}
